cons: Red meat can be high in saturated fats. Saturated fat, can clog arteries, leading to health complications.
Meat cooked at high temperatures can create chemical reactions leading to high levels of harmful compounds.
It May Make You Resistant To some antibiotics.
description: Protein is the main nutritional component of meat.
Beef protein is highly nutritious and may promote muscle maintenance and growth.
Beef contains varying amounts of fat which contributes substantially to its energy content.
Beef is an excellent source of various vitamins and minerals.
Beef is an excellent source of iron, and may help prevent anemia when eaten regularly
Glutathione (Master antioxidant) linking to Anti-aging benefits, Increasing longevity, Preventing illness, Reducing the risk of chronic disease, Strengthening the immune system.
name: Beef
